result.markdown:
---
title: "Explaining Black-Box Models with LIME"
author: "Gani Cem Türemen"
---


# Challenge Summary

In this challenge, we take the models we’ve developed and explain their localized prediction results to understand the reasons behind their predictions which will help with the assessment of trust to a model. 

# Objectives

Apply your learning of LIME (Local Interpretable Model-Agnostic Explanations) on H2O models to explain their results.

# Solution

## Import Libraries


::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_836e2cf2e46c5df32ebbc6ad8457002b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(h2o)
library(recipes)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyquant)
library(lime)
```
:::


## Load the training & test dataset


::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_d65d5a536a33ab2f7fd98a87952bf5fa'}

```{.r .cell-code}
employee_attrition_tbl <- read_csv(
  "data/datasets-1067-1925-WA_Fn-UseC_-HR-Employee-Attrition.csv")

definitions_raw_tbl <- read_excel("data/data_definitions.xlsx",
                                  sheet = 1,
                                  col_names = FALSE)
```
:::



::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_b4eb8ed8fbd9b75ae5b0a125104cbcb5'}

```{.r .cell-code}
employee_attrition_readable_tbl <- process_hr_data_readable(employee_attrition_tbl, 
                                                            definitions_raw_tbl)

employee_attrition_readable_tbl %>% glimpse()
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_fccf3ae3dcd693f8a7e3eb9a0bf648f2'}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_b42bf3dfe6bc156b34307d445269ea49'}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(seed = 1113)
split_obj <- rsample::initial_split(employee_attrition_readable_tbl, prop = 0.85)

train_readable_tbl <- rsample::training(split_obj)
test_readable_tbl  <- rsample::testing(split_obj)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_796f92571e0b6ec56919c38b5967f9b4'}

```{.r .cell-code}
recipe_obj <- recipe(Attrition ~ ., data = train_readable_tbl) %>%
  step_zv(all_predictors()) %>%
  step_mutate_at(c("JobLevel", "StockOptionLevel"), fn = as.factor) %>% 
  prep()

train_tbl <- bake(recipe_obj, new_data = train_readable_tbl)
test_tbl  <- bake(recipe_obj, new_data = test_readable_tbl)

train_tbl %>% glimpse()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

:::
:::


## Specify the response and predictor variables


::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_1ba9614ee3b15a1ec51471a2a3cbfd34'}

```{.r .cell-code}
h2o.init()

split_h2o <- h2o.splitFrame(as.h2o(train_tbl), ratios = c(0.80), seed = 767)
train_h2o <- split_h2o[[1]]
valid_h2o <- split_h2o[[2]]
test_h2o  <- as.h2o(test_tbl)

y <- "Attrition"
x <- setdiff(names(train_h2o), y)
```
:::


## Run AutoML specifying the stopping criterion


::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_e4f63104ef1a2301714f2ad9dcc6dbd5'}

```{.r .cell-code}
automl_models_h2o <- h2o.automl(
  x = x,
  y = y,
  training_frame    = train_h2o,
  validation_frame  = valid_h2o,
  leaderboard_frame = test_h2o,
  max_runtime_secs  = 30,
  nfolds            = 5 
)
```
:::


## View the leaderboard


::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_5aa942888a69cb50c450c6d133745caf'}

```{.r .cell-code}
automl_models_h2o@leaderboard
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

```
:::
:::


## Predicting using Leader Model




::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-12_82a13ec8d1670df1d9c8a81559414f07'}

```{.r .cell-code}
leader_model <- automl_models_h2o@leaderboard %>% 
  extract_h2o_model_name_by_position(1) %>% 
  h2o.getModel()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> StackedEnsemble_BestOfFamily_2_AutoML_1_20230604_174346
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-13_23ad9217c7801902b8a8608164999e7c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
predictions_tbl <- leader_model %>% 
  h2o.predict(newdata = as.h2o(test_tbl)) %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  bind_cols(test_tbl %>% select(Attrition, EmployeeNumber)
  )

predictions_tbl %>% glimpse()
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-14_48e26e151bb2546b0eb6be1a358fa070'}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> Rows: 221
#> Columns: 5
#> $ predict        <fct> Yes, No, No, No, No, No, No, Yes, Yes, No, No, No, No, …
#> $ No             <dbl> 0.5075783, 0.8228293, 0.8627508, 0.9251066, 0.9509719, …
#> $ Yes            <dbl> 0.492421742, 0.177170716, 0.137249238, 0.074893450, 0.0…
#> $ Attrition      <fct> No, No, No, Yes, No, Yes, No, Yes, Yes, No, No, No, No,…
#> $ EmployeeNumber <dbl> 10, 16, 30, 31, 40, 42, 46, 55, 64, 77, 80, 83, 85, 96,…
```
:::
:::


## Create Explainer


::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-15_8a5beba8dafc05ec3e4b8a57c66a8707'}

```{.r .cell-code}
explainer <- train_tbl %>%
  select(-Attrition) %>%
  lime(
    model           = leader_model,
    bin_continuous  = TRUE,
    n_bins          = 4,
    quantile_bins   = TRUE
  )
```
:::


## Single Explanation


::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-16_f28768b50fa6e8a5f0ad841cd6caa83a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
explanation <- test_tbl %>%
  slice(2) %>%
  select(-Attrition) %>%
  lime::explain(explainer = explainer, 
                n_labels   = 1, 
                n_features = 8, 
                n_permutations = 5000, 
                kernel_width   = 1)

explanation %>% glimpse()
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-17_e30d57565dd51b92e3b5c67f9a22e5bb'}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-18_af0089138d4c511be22961c026cc12e5'}

```{.r .cell-code}
custom_plot_features <- function(expl) {
  
  case <- expl$case[1]
  lab <- expl$label[1]
  prob <- expl$label_prob[1] %>% round(2)
  expl_fit <- expl$model_r2[1] %>% round(2)
  
  text <- paste(" Case: ", case, "\n", "Label: ", lab, "\n", "Probability: ", prob, "\n", "Explanation Fit: ", expl_fit)
  
  g <- expl %>% 
    arrange(desc(abs(feature_weight))) %>%
    mutate(feature_type = case_when(
      (feature_weight) >= 0 ~ "Supports",
      TRUE ~ "Contradicts") %>% as.factor()) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = feature_desc, y = feature_weight, group = feature_weight)) +
    geom_col(aes(reorder(feature_desc, abs(feature_weight)), fill = feature_type)) + 
    scale_fill_manual("", values = c("Supports" = "#FF8014", "Contradicts" = "#2DC6D6")) + 
    coord_flip() +
    labs(x = "Feature", y = "Weight", subtitle = text) +
    theme(
      legend.position = "bottom", 
      legend.background = element_rect(fill = NA, color = "white"), 
      panel.background = element_blank(), 
      panel.border = element_rect(color = "white", fill = NA), 
      plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"), 
      line = element_line(color = "white"), 
      text = element_text(color = "white"), 
      axis.ticks = element_line(color = "white"), 
      axis.text = element_text(color = "white"),
      plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 7)
  )
    
  return(g)
}
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-19_15fed44f0e14b37964ffb863132aa304'}

```{.r .cell-code}
custom_plot_features(explanation)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](06_lime_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-19-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Multiple Explanations


::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-20_4745e4ce986a7a6fced87b52d0bf9461'}

```{.r .cell-code}
explanation_multiple <- test_tbl %>%
  slice(1:20) %>%
  select(-Attrition) %>%
  lime::explain(
    explainer = explainer,
    n_labels   = 1,
    n_features = 8,
    n_permutations = 5000,
    kernel_width   = 0.5
  )

explanation_multiple %>% glimpse()
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-21_8a3aea5e6ae53e137e0336bbb24b8c63'}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> Rows: 160
#> Columns: 13
#> $ model_type       <chr> "classification", "classification", "classification",…
#> $ case             <chr> "1", "1", "1", "1", "1", "1", "1", "1", "2", "2", "2"…
#> $ label            <chr> "No", "No", "No", "No", "No", "No", "No", "No", "No",…
#> $ label_prob       <dbl> 0.5075783, 0.5075783, 0.5075783, 0.5075783, 0.5075783…

#> $ feature_desc     <chr> "OverTime = Yes", "RelationshipSatisfaction = Low", "…
#> $ data             <list> [59, Travel_Rarely, 1324, Research & Development, 3,…
#> $ prediction       <list> [0.5075783, 0.4924217], [0.5075783, 0.4924217], [0.5…
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-22_b57ea45fcd97ad6c6aa4bf0cec344c76'}

```{.r .cell-code}
custom_plot_explanations <- function(expl) {
  
  expl$case <- as_factor(expl$case)
  
  g <- expl %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = case, y = feature_desc, fill = feature_weight)) +
    geom_tile() + 
    facet_wrap(~ label) +
    scale_fill_gradient2("Feature Weight", 
                         low = "#2DC6D6", 
                         high = "#FF8014", 
                         mid = "white") + 
    labs(x = "Case", y = "Feature") +
    theme(
      legend.background = element_rect(fill = NA, color = "white"), 
      panel.background = element_blank(),
      panel.border = element_rect(color = "white", fill = NA),
      panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
      plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"), 
      line = element_line(color = "white"), 
      text = element_text(color = "white"), 
      axis.ticks = element_line(color = "white"), 
      axis.text = element_text(color = "white", size = 5)
  )
  
  return(g)
}
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_lime_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-23_0db4cca8300e8c13f92be0a376ec2d4f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
custom_plot_explanations(explanation_multiple)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](06_lime_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-23-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
